skill.name: Sylvio's Showstopping Performance
skill.description: Can be used when your Life Points decrease by 1500. This Skill can only be used once per Duel. Instead of conducting a Normal Draw, draw an "Abyss Actor" or "Yosenju" monster of your choice. In addition, add a Pendulum Zone to your field if you begin the Duel with a Deck that has 9 or more "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monsters or "Yosenju" monsters. (Extra Deck does not count.)

skill.name: Sealed Tombs
skill.description: Can be used if your Life Points are lower than your opponent's by 1000 or more. Until the end of your opponent's next turn, neither player can banish cards from the Graveyard or Special Summon monsters from the Graveyard. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

Summon LIGHT Monster(s) 200 time(s) in total.

Win a Duel against Ishizu Ishatar with at least 6,000 LP remaining.

skill.name: Neo New Sylvio
skill.description: At the beginning of the Duel, add 1 "Yosenju Shinchu L", and 1 "Yosenju Shinchu R" to the bottom of your Deck. In addition, the following effect can be used once per Duel after your Life Points decrease by 2000. Return 1 "Yosenju" card in your hand to your Deck and add 1 "Yosenju Oroshi Channeling" to your hand from outside of your Deck. This Skill can only be used if you begin the Duel with a Deck that contains at least 9 "Yosenju" cards. (Extra Deck does not count.)

skill.name: Smile World
skill.description: Add 1 "Smile World" to your hand from outside of your Deck. If you activate this Skill, you can only activate or use the effect of "Smile" Spell/Trap cards until the end of your opponent's next turn. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

skill.name: Master of Rites
skill.description:
Can be used each time your Life Points decrease by 1000. Return 1 card from your hand to your Deck and choose 1 of the following: 
 ● Add 1 random Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand. 
 ● Add 1 random Ritual Spell Card from your Deck to your hand. 
 This Skill can only be used twice per Duel.

skill.name: Destiny Draw
skill.description: Can be used when your Life Points decrease by 2000. In the Draw Phase, instead of conducting your normal draw, draw a card of your choice. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Yami Yugi efficiently! His decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements.

children.content: keys to duel at the gate
He appears at the gate at Stage 15 (unless chosen as your starting character)
Yami Yugi Level 40 appears at the gate upon reaching Stage 30
Pick as a starter character (or reach Stage 15 in DM Duel World if you choose
Use a Spell Card 5 time(s) in one Duel.
and win 1 Duel(s) against Yami Yugi at level 30 in Duel World.

skill.name: Sylvio's Showstopping Performance
skill.description: Can be used when your Life Points decrease by 1500. This Skill can only be used once per Duel. Instead of conducting a Normal Draw, draw an "Abyss Actor" or "Yosenju" monster of your choice. In addition, add a Pendulum Zone to your field if you begin the Duel with a Deck that has 9 or more "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monsters or "Yosenju" monsters. (Extra Deck does not count.)
